Package au.csiro.pathling.library

Class TerminologyHelpers

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.library.TerminologyHelpers
public class TerminologyHelpers extends Object
Utility class for working with FHIR terminology concepts.
Author:
John Grimes, Piotr Szul

  • Method Details

    • toCoding

      @Nonnull public static Column toCoding(@Nonnull Column codingColumn, @Nullable String system, @Nullable String version)
      Converts a Column containing codes into a Column that contains a Coding struct. The Coding struct Column can be used as an input to terminology functions such as Terminology.member_of(org.apache.spark.sql.Column, java.lang.String) and Terminology.translate(org.apache.spark.sql.Column, java.lang.String, boolean, java.util.Collection<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.codesystems.ConceptMapEquivalence>, java.lang.String). A null value passed in to the codingColumn parameter will result in a null value being returned.
      Parameters:
      codingColumn - the Column containing codes
      system - the URI of the system for the codes
      version - the version of the system for the codes
      Returns:
      a Column containing a Coding struct

    • toEclValueSet

      @Nonnull public static String toEclValueSet(@Nonnull String ecl)
      Converts a SNOMED CT ECL expression into a FHIR ValueSet URI. Can be used with the Terminology.member_of(org.apache.spark.sql.Column, java.lang.String) function.
      Parameters:
      ecl - the ECL expression
      Returns:
      a FHIR ValueSet URI
